name: CentralVenousPressure
title: Central Venous Pressure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes representing observation of a patient's central venous pressure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify an observation of a central venous pressure in a patient.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Physical exam, finding data type.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes representing the observation of central venous pressure using LOINC code system.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
